abstract.t: This is the resource set profile outlining the energy sector related endpoints. In addition to outlining Initiator and Provider provisions it also specifies requirements for the Energy Authority (electricity assets and usage) and Energy Plan Website (retail electricity plan information). Notational Conventions The keywords "REQUIRED", "SHALL", "SHALL NOT", "SHOULD", "SHOULD NOT", "RECOMMENDED", "MAY", and "OPTIONAL" in this document are to be interpreted as described in [RFC2119].
